thread.title: Photos: New Cape Coast stadium nears completion
thread.title_full: Photos: New Cape Coast stadium nears completion

title: Photos: New Cape Coast stadium nears completion
text:
Date: 12-10-2015 Time: 09:10:22:am 
Works on the 35 million dollar new Cape Coast Stadium Project is almost done. 
The China-aided stadium being constructed by the China Jiangxi Corporation for International Economic and Technical Corporation will have the capacity to accommodate 16,000 spectators. 
Watch Photos as the new stadium takes shape: 
- 
Follow Joy Sports on Twitter: @Joy997FM. Our hashtag is #JoySports
